QuestData.Title: Getting the Crew Back Together
QuestData.Description: Oh wow, the debris is all over the mountainside! The survivors won't make it if we don't do something quick. They need healing NOW!$b$bHere, take my bandages and go patch them up.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you rescue everyone you could?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n.$b$bOnce Gazwitz gets his team up here we can get the crewmen back to the Gearworks.
